recipesJson.name: Ethereal | Blackberries & Raspberry Drink
recipesJson.author: SteamOn
recipesJson.description:
This is my all day vape. When I want something fruity and with a quickness, I whip this up. It's refreshing and juicy. A well balanced representation of Blackberry and Raspberry. It was inspired by the Blackberry Raspberry Gatorade.

Steep Required: No (Good right away, But best after 2-3 days imo)

The suggested ratio for this eliquid is 70 VG / 30 PG But should be fine with an 80 VG / 20 PG ratio should you like to thicken it.

Flavor Notes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q3ofVSy87Ms
